Mailing Address: c/o Home Together Canada AssociationPO Box 22041Capri CentreKelowna, BC     V1Y 9N9
Service Details: - Offers those 55 years of age and over the guidelines and tools needed to successfully home-share with others through a confidential, online, emembers-only resource website- Members post their profile and find others of like mind with whom they feel they could comfortably live, then get to know them through the site chat room, emails and phone calls- By sharing a home, the quality and amenities of the home shared will be far greater than a single individual could comfortably afford, and each person will be able to enjoy a multitude of benefits from safety, to shared cooking, to gardening, to having someone to play a board or card game with, and much more
Eligibility: Note: Although the focus is on 55 and older, all ages are welcome to use this site if they wish to pursue living collectively with others
